Mushroom Girl: Oh thank you so much, Radish Boy! You're my hero!
By the way, are you still up to sneaking out at night to play?
Radish Boy: Of course! I'm even here to see whether you guys are still up for it!
Mushroom Girl: He he, alright! I'll go fetch my ball first then.
Why don't you pay a visit to Carrot Boy's home to see whether he's ready? I'll wait for you guys at the village exit.
Radish Boy: Sure! Then I'll be heading to the north east side of town. See ya later!
